content: Just a note to say I love you more than pizza, and that's saying something, {wife_name}! Thinking of you always.
Random thought: You're the WiFi to my laptop - I can't function without you! Miss you!
Hey {wife_name}, Marriage tip: I'm always wrong, and I'm totally fine with that.
My love, You're the reason I smile... and also the reason I need coffee. You're the best!
Hey beautiful, I love you even when you steal all the blankets, {wife_name}. Forever yours.
Just a note to say You're my favorite weirdo, and I wouldn't have it any other way! Forever yours.
Sending you love because Thanks for putting up with me. I know I'm a lot! You make me so happy!
My love, You're the cheese to my macaroni - we're better together! Miss you!
Random thought: I love you more than Netflix, and that's a BIG deal. Can't wait to see you later!
Sending you love because You had me at 'I'll cook dinner tonight.' Thinking of you always.
I was just thinking... Marriage is just texting 'What do you want for dinner?' until we die. XOXO
My love, You're my favorite notification on my phone, {wife_name}! You're the best!
Just because I can: I promise to always let you have the last slice of pizza... maybe. Forever yours.
You're stuck with me forever. Sorry, no refunds! Miss you!
Thinking of you and I love you even when you're hangry.
Random thought: You complete me... especially my sentences. Forever yours.
My love, Thanks for laughing at my jokes even when they're terrible. Can't wait to see you later!
Thinking of you and I'd share my fries with you, and that's true love. You're the best!
My love, You're the avocado to my toast - expensive but totally worth it! XOXO
Good morning, {wife_name}! I love you more than I love sleeping in, {wife_name}. Have a wonderful day!
Thinking of you and You're my favorite human to be weird with. Have a wonderful day!
Just a note to say Marriage is just asking each other 'did you hear that noise?' forever. Can't wait to see you later!
Hope you're having a great day! I'd let you have the TV remote. Sometimes. Miss you!
Thinking of you and You're the only person I'd share my snacks with, {wife_name}. You're amazing!
Just because I can: Thanks for pretending my dad jokes are funny! You make me so happy!
Just because I can: I love you more than my phone battery loves dying at 20%. XOXO
Hope you're having a great day! You're my emergency contact and my emergency snack supplier. You're amazing!
Just a note to say Marriage: because who else would put up with this? Miss you!
Hey beautiful, You make my heart do that thing hearts do. You know, beat. You're the best!
Hope you're having a great day! I'd pause my video game for you. That's love. Love you!
Sweetheart, You're the reason I smile and the reason I have gray hairs! Forever yours.
Just a note to say Thanks for choosing me when you could have had literally anyone else. Have a wonderful day!
Random thought: I love you like a fat kid loves cake. Wait, I'm the fat kid. XOXO
Just a note to say You're my favorite hello and my hardest goodbye, {wife_name}. XOXO
My love, If loving you was a crime, I'd be serving a life sentence. XOXO
Hope you're having a great day! You're the only person who knows how weird I really am.
I was just thinking... I'd share my dessert with you. THAT'S how much I love you. You're the best!
